{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Hawking |model=HAW2R1 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin=B004Y65SHG |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=02/10/2011 |manuf_country=China |manuf=Edimax |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=repeater,wireless router |fcc_id=SOY-HAW2R1 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3052 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV320DBTI-70G |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Zentel |ram1_model=A3V28S40ETP-G6 |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3052 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if=USB |wi2_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi2_chip1_model=RT3070 |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=1 |wi2_rxchains=1 |wi2_sstreams=1 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=Smart_Repeater_Pro |default_ssid_regex=^Smart_Repeater_Pro$ |default_ip=192.168.5.200 |default_user=admin |default_pass=1234 |oui=00:0E:3B |oui_eth=00:0E:3B |default_ch= }} ''Hi-Gain Wireless-N Dual Radio Smart Repeater Pro'' / ''Hi-Gain Wireless-300N Smart Repeater Pro''
[http://hawkingtech.com/index.php/products/wireless/repeaters_&_extenders/haw2r1.html Product page] OEM Edimax "1244-00000607-01Z" is silkscreened on the USB wireless module. The manual says the default SSID is '''Smart_Repeater_Pro'''.
